trans-unit.source: Search Fields: Comma separated list of database fields used for searching
Developer Mode: Enables the backend module with the field configurator.
Address Export: Enables the backend address export module.
Address Export Templates: Set an alternate path for export render templates
tt_address Mapping: Enables mapping of sic_address on tt_address
TemplateSet: Choose one of the preset template sets.
Doublets: Enable module for finding and removing address doublets.
